rooms.name: Overgrown Shuttle Courts
rooms.description: Stepping outside, you find yourself in a courtyard swallowed by nature. Tall grasses and vines obscure the cracked pavement. The skeletal remains of a swing set creak in the breeze. A sense of desolation hangs in the air.

rooms.name: Ransacked Canteen
rooms.description: You enter what used to be the cafeteria, now a scene of chaos. Tables and chairs are overturned, and the floor is littered with discarded wrappers and cans. A faint odor of spoiled food lingers.

rooms.name: Ruined Concoursed
rooms.description: You stand in a decaying classroom, its walls covered in graffiti and broken glass. Desks are overturned, and tattered textbooks lie scattered on the floor. The scent of dampness and decay fills the air.

rooms.name: Forgotten Library
rooms.description: Rows of bookshelves stretch before you, their contents reduced to ruins by time and neglect. Sunlight filters through cracked windows, casting eerie shadows on the torn pages that flutter in the breeze. An air of knowledge lost hangs heavily.

rooms.name: Abandoned Staff Room
rooms.description: Before you stretches an empty hall, its basketball hoops missing, and the wooden floor warped and cracked. Faded banners hang from the rafters, commemorating past victories. A strange silence pervades the space.
